summary: Provides a Home Assistant vacuum device implementation for Neato Connected Vacuums, mapping Neato API information to Home Assistant attributes and exposing control commands such as start, pause, stop, dock, power on/off, and map retrieval.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant users to monitor and control Neato robot vacuums through the Home Assistant interface and automations, offering status, battery level, cleaning progress, and map data integration.
